name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is our main programming langauge for FrontEnd

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript helps to abstract our development

name: CSS 3
description: Defacto styling standard

name: SCSS
description: CSS preprocessor. Simplify CSS coding

name: JSON
description: Standard data structure

name: HTML 5
description: Defacto web styling standard

name: ES6+
description: Modern JS standard

name: Vue 2
description: Modern UI Framework, EOL around 1 year. It's on the path to deprecation.

name: Vue 3
description: Next version of vue js. Wee need to adopt this as soon as possible and smoothly

name: Nodejs
description: JS Engine, defacto

name: React
description: Popular JS library. We hold this library because it was hard to maintain in previous projects. Hard also to find someone capable of coding React properly

name: Angular
description: Old JS framework. This is the first Angular. We used in old blibli.com UI. Hard to improve performance and very old in technology features

name: Jest
description: Simple test runner. It's proven to be fast to code and run. Moreover, it's very easy to scale

name: Eslint
description: Linter. It's used to provide quick style correction and applying good coding patterns.

name: AMP
description: Web component framework for use in Google browsers

name: Karma+Mocha
description: Previous test runner we used in webpack 2. Now it's left behind because it was hard to setup the test and configuring it.

name: Nuxt.js 3
description: Server side rendering with vue. This may be the future of Vue. We would love to have SSR to provide faster LCP

name: GraphQL
description: Web query standard to be used for API end points. It can describe data join and filtered fields.

name: Service worker
description: Web worker used to manage resources and background process for a website that can make it behave like a standalone application.

name: Partytown
description: Library to speed up site by offloading third-party scripts to a web worker. In hope of reducing main thread workload, to increase TBT / TTI

name: NPM
description: Defacto package manager. We will use it as default package manager for Frontend projects.

name: Yarn
description: Popular package manager. We are not recommending using it because it has deviated quite much from the official package manager (NPM)

name: PNPM
description: New kid on the block package manager. The package download and installation process are done in parallel, increasing installation speed.

name: Playwright
description: Browser runner for automated testing. We use this to accomodate integration testing.

name: Webpack
description: Popular packager

name: Rollup
description: Faster packager

name: Parcel
description: Hold because of inconsistent result (can't be used in webpack)

name: Vite.js
description: New Vue packager

name: vue-cli
description: Vue project runner and builder

name: babel
description: JS transpiler

name: lighthouse
description: Web benchmarker

name: lerna
description: Multi repo package manager, hold because of no update

name: node-sass
description: SASS transpiler based on c - deprecated

name: dart-sass / sass
description: SASS transpiler based on dart

name: vuex
description: State management

name: JQuery
description: Old-school coding

name: vuex
description: State management

name: axios
description: AJAX library helper, should be replaced with built-in window.fetch function or use polyfill for it

name: Blue DLS Vue 2
description: Standard Blibli Design Language

name: Blue DLS Vue 3
description: Standard Blibli Design Language for Vue 3

name: Blue DLS Library - Single Component approach
description: DLS library published as individual components

name: Blue Icon
description: Blue standard icons

name: vue-i18n
description: I18n support for vue

name: Polyfill.io using polyfill-io-feature-detection
description: Dynamic polyfill library to support older browser

name: date-format-lite
description: Lightweight date formatter

name: moment.js
description: Date formatter and manipulator, too heavy to use

name: GCS
description: Google Cloud Storage for static contents

name: docker
description: Container management

name: Docker desktop
description: Container management UI and dashboard

name: podman
description: Free Container management

name: Rancher Desktop
description: Docker desktop replacement

name: NGINX
description: Default UI server

name: Micro FE
description: Blibli Micro FE implementation

name: Global Variable in Micro FE
description: Avoid using shared global variable, hard to maintain

name: Window event messaging
description: Use window custom event to communicate across components from different repo or inside iframe

name: Vue composition API
description: Functional programming for Vue

name: GTM
description: De-facto client-side script management

name: Lazy-load / Lazy-rendering
description: Only load or render inside viewport content

name: web.dev - Web Core Vitals
description: Measurement standard for web

name: Sonar 8
description: Static Code Analyzer for test coverage and potential risk
